analysis.description:
EOSGOLD.startDate (/unique_chucks/48/0x080255570182efc85fab4acd1a8d74a2b98d40ef.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/48/0x080255570182efc85fab4acd1a8d74a2b98d40ef.sol#220-232)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/48/0x080255570182efc85fab4acd1a8d74a2b98d40ef.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/48/0x080255570182efc85fab4acd1a8d74a2b98d40ef.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/48/0x080255570182efc85fab4acd1a8d74a2b98d40ef.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
